check_box.label: Force Draw Distance
check_box.name: force_draw_distance
check_box.tool_tip: Enables locking draw distance for all agents in this region. NOTE: This may lag users with lower-performance computers. (Default: Off)

spinner.label: Max Drag Distance
spinner.name: max_drag_distance
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum distance a prim can be dragged in this region

spinner.label: Max Prim Scale
spinner.name: max_prim_scale
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum size a prim can be made in this region

spinner.label: Min Prim Scale
spinner.name: min_prim_scale
spinner.tool_tip: Minimum size a prim can be made in this region

spinner.label: Max Physical Prim Scale
spinner.name: max_phys_prim_scale
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum size a physical prim can be made in this region

spinner.label: Max Hollow Size
spinner.name: max_hollow_size
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum size a hole can be made in a prim created in this region

spinner.label: Min Hole Size
spinner.name: min_hole_size
spinner.tool_tip: Minimum size a hole can be made in a prim created in this region

spinner.label: Max Link Count
spinner.name: max_link_count
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum amount of objects that can be linked in a non-physical linkset for this region

spinner.label: Max Link Count Phys
spinner.name: max_link_count_phys
spinner.tool_tip: Maximum amount of objects that can be linked in a physical linkset for this region

spinner.label: Max Inventory Items To Transfer
spinner.name: max_inventory_items_transfer
spinner.tool_tip: Number of objects that may be transfered between clients at once. -1 sets unlimited number of objects. (Default: -1)

spinner.label: Show Tags
spinner.name: show_tags
spinner.tool_tip: Nametag mode for this region. (Show nametags = 2, Show nametags briefly = 1, Blocks nametags = 0)

spinner.label: Max Groups
spinner.name: max_groups
spinner.tool_tip: Number of groups an agent can join. -1 sets unlimited number of groups. (Default: -1)

check_box.label: Render Water
check_box.name: render_water
check_box.tool_tip: Enable water rendering in the region. (Default: On)

check_box.label: Allow Minimap
check_box.name: allow_minimap
check_box.tool_tip: Allow the minimap in this region. (Default: On)

check_box.label: Allow Physical Prims
check_box.name: allow_physical_prims
check_box.tool_tip: Allow physical prims to be created in this region. (Default: On)

check_box.label: Enforce Max Build Constraints
check_box.name: enforce_max_build
check_box.tool_tip: Enforce maximum build constraints in this region. (Default: On)

check_box.label: Allow Parcel WindLight
check_box.name: allow_parcel_windlight
check_box.tool_tip: Enable WindLight for parcels in this region. (Default: On)
